name: Kingslayer: The First Assassin
description:
Invade the royal castle in this minimalist limited movement puzzle game.

The Gameplay

Move the assassin to pass throughout the level with limited movements to get to the King's Room.
You will need to attack! Every level you have a specific quantity of daggers to use in the enemies.



Key Features
- Dark fantasy atmospheric minimalist visuals
- 28 hand-craft levels
- Original acoustic guitar soundtrack
- Design for keyboard and mouse, but with movement and restart comands for gamepads.
